Title: The Insiders Guide to Happiness
Actors: Will Hall, Fraser Brown, Paolo Rotondo, Ben Barrington, Samantha Jukes, Madeleine Sami, Sophia Hawthorne, Fasitua Amosa, Sally Stockwell, Jeremy Randerson, Loren Horsley
Plot: The Insiders Guide to Happiness is a television drama based around a diverse group of people whose lives become inextricably inter-linked following one bizarre event, the outcome of which forces each character to examine and explore the happiness in his or her own life.
